data.title: Boutique Hotel in Historic Foggy Bottom
data.meta_description: Discover ARC HOTEL Washington DC, Georgetown and enjoy this Washington DC hotel guest rooms and suites. Every detail of ARC HOTEL DC has been designed with your comfort in mind. Our hotel will make your stay a wonderful unforgettable experience.
data.text:
ARC HOTEL - Monumental Experiences

Experience ARC HOTEL Washington DC just minutes from Georgetown and all the attractions that Washington DC has to offer just steps from the hotel. Located in the delightfully urban setting of the prestigious, historic Foggy Bottom and steps away from George Washington University, you will do more than visit Washington DC. At ARC HOTEL, you will travel like a tourist, stay like a local.

The ARC HOTEL DC is bridging the way to the future of travel. We proudly offer clean, spacious guest rooms & suites in excess of 300 sq. ft. that offer functionality and comfort. Our Washington DC hotel features exceptional service, modern amenities in a sophisticated atmosphere. If travel is more like a way of life for you, then ARC HOTEL Washington DC, Georgetown is the destination for you. At ARC HOTEL DC, you will experience purposeful service, tailored to you â€“ our guest, not a market trend.
